2.1.title: Table of Contents
2.1.description: Provide a comprehensive Table of Contents for Module 2.
2.1.prompt: Generate a Table of Contents for Module 2 CTD submission according to ICH M4E guidelines. {{#if IncludeAppendices}}Include appendices in the TOC.{{/if}} {{#if AddHyperlinks}}Add hyperlinks to all document sections.{{/if}}
2.1.guidanceText: This section should follow CTD format and include a comprehensive Table of Contents for Module 2.

2.2.title: Introduction
2.2.description: Provide a concise overview of the pharmaceutical class, mode of action, and proposed clinical use.
2.2.prompt: Draft an introduction for a CTD submission about a {{DrugClass}} with the following mechanism of action: {{MechanismOfAction}}. The proposed indication is: {{ProposedIndication}}.
2.2.guidanceText: Introduction should provide a concise overview of the pharmaceutical class, mode of action, and proposed clinical use.

2.7.title: Clinical Summary
2.7.description: Provide a comprehensive clinical summary with detailed analysis of benefits and risks.
2.7.prompt: Generate a detailed Clinical Summary for the {{Population}} population. Include efficacy data: {{EfficacySummary}}. Incorporate safety findings: {{SafetySummary}}. Justify dosing: {{DoseJustification}}.
2.7.guidanceText: This section should follow ICH E3 guidelines. Use Ctrl+Enter or Cmd+Enter to generate section content with AI assistance.
